statements: SELECT * FROM device_log ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT device_id, event_type FROM device_log WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_id, event_type, event_details FROM device_log WHERE device_id = 100 ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT event_type FROM device_log;
SELECT log_id, device_id, event_type, event_details FROM device_log WHERE event_type LIKE '%error%';
SELECT * FROM device_log WHERE device_id = 123 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, event_type, event_details FROM device_log WHERE event_type LIKE '%error%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS num_logs FROM device_log GROUP BY device_id HAVING num_logs > 100;
SELECT event_type, COUNT(*) AS num_events FROM device_log GROUP BY event_type ORDER BY num_events DESC;
SELECT * FROM device_log WHERE device_id = 456 AND event_type = 'warning' ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM DeviceActivity WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM DeviceActivity WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT id, activity_type FROM DeviceActivity ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM SecurityEvents WHERE event_type = 'Login' AND event_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT id, event_description FROM SecurityEvents WHERE event_time < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT id, device_id, activity_type, timestamp FROM DeviceActivity WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM DeviceActivity WHERE activity_type = 'login' OR activity_type = 'logout' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM DeviceActivity GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT id, event_type, event_description, event_time FROM SecurityEvents WHERE event_type = 'intrusion' AND event_time BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY event_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DATE(timestamp) AS date, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM DeviceActivity GROUP BY DATE(timestamp) ORDER BY total_activities DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM device_activity ORDER BY activity_time DESC;
SELECT device_id, activity_time, activity_type FROM device_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login' ORDER BY activity_time ASC;
SELECT device_id, activity_time, activity_type FROM device_activity WHERE device_id = 1234;
SELECT count(*) AS total_activities FROM device_activity;
SELECT device_id, activity_time, activity_type FROM device_activity WHERE activity_description LIKE '%error%';
SELECT * FROM device_activity ORDER BY activity_time DESC;
SELECT device_id, activity_type FROM device_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login' AND device_id = 123;
SELECT event_type, event_time FROM security_events WHERE event_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY event_time ASC;
SELECT log_id, log_type, log_description FROM audit_logs WHERE log_type IN ('error', 'warning') AND log_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM device_activity INNER JOIN security_events ON device_activity.device_id = security_events.event_id ORDER BY device_activity.activity_time ASC, security_events.event_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM DeviceActivity ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, activity_type FROM DeviceActivity WHERE activity_type='login';
SELECT * FROM SecurityEvents WHERE severity > 3 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT event_type, timestamp FROM SecurityEvents WHERE event_type='intrusion';
SELECT * FROM UserAuditLogs WHERE action='login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM DeviceActivity WHERE activity_type='Maintenance' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, activity_description FROM DeviceActivity WHERE activity_type='Error' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS activity_count FROM DeviceActivity GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY activity_count DESC;
SELECT u.user_id, u.action, l.log_timestamp FROM UserAuditLogs u JOIN DeviceLogs l ON u.user_id = l.device_id WHERE u.action='Login' ORDER BY l.log_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT e.event_type, e.severity, l.log_description FROM SecurityEvents e LEFT JOIN DeviceLogs l ON e.event_id = l.device_id WHERE e.severity >= 3 ORDER BY e.severity DESC, l.log_description ASC;
SELECT log_id, log_event, log_timestamp FROM device_logs;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type, device_location FROM device_info;
SELECT event_id, device_id, event_type, event_description FROM security_events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, user_role, last_login FROM user_activity WHERE account_status = 'active';
SELECT user_id, log_timestamp, log_event FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM device_logs LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, log_timestamp, log_event FROM device_logs WHERE device_id = 5 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_location FROM device_info WHERE device_type = 'mobile' ORDER BY last_activity_timestamp ASC;
SELECT event_type, event_description FROM security_events WHERE event_id > 1000;
SELECT username, user_role, last_login FROM user_activity WHERE account_status = 'active' ORDER BY last_login DESC;
